General.Name: Yibin Paper Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Yibin Paper Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. The company offers food packaging base paper, household paper, natural paper cups, tissue base papers, PE coated paper, and bamboo pulp boards. Yibin Paper Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is based in Yibin, China.
General.Address: Peishi Light Industrial Park, Yibin, China, 644100
